1. Microsoft's new Copilot Pro brings AI-powered Office features to the rest of us  The Verge
  2. $20 extra a month gets you the pro version of Microsoft's AI Copilot. Or you could just get Valheim every 30 days, instead  PC Gamer
  3. Microsoft Copilot (free) vs Copilot Pro: What are the differences and features?  Windows Central
  4. Check the Copilot Pro small print — Microsoft just revealed the true cost of AI, and it's steep  Tom's Guide
  5. Everything To Know About Microsoft Copilot For iOS And Android  SlashGear
